text: Serhiy Volodymyrovych Zakarlyuka (17 August 1976 – 6 October 2014) was a Ukrainian footballer and football manager. Zakarlyuka has played for a number of clubs in Ukraine and played for the Ukraine national team on 9 occasions between 2002 and 2004.rsssf: Ukraine record international footballers On 6 October 2014, Zakarlyuka was killed in the traffic accident just outside of Poltava.Погиб Сергей Закарлюка (Rus) ==References== ==Other websites== * Information and foto by Serhiy Zakarlyuka at arsenal-kiev.com.ua * Category:1976 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Ukrainian footballers
title: Serhiy Zakarlyuka
